casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Thomas, Appellant.
Submitted November 22, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien and Robeets, JJ.
Steven H. Shantz and Melvm Dildine, Assistant Defenders, and Herman I. Pollock, Defender, for appellant.
James D. Crawford, Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
January 15, 1969:
